overview: Summer 1988 in Corsica, Vanina, a 14-year-old girl is having fun with her cousin and 16-year-old sister. The teenage girls sneak out to dance and find boys in the only nightclub around. To reach it, they walk on the edge of the national road, in the wild trails, cross the Venaco pass under the big starry sky of the mountain, a long journey of 9 km on foot. That night, Vanina will discover a new and magical reality where the feeling of the night, the vibrations of wild nature and pop music mingle.
title: Fourteen
